title: [WORK] 5: "How To Feel More Alive In Your Job" w/ Dan Cable
description: Often times we associate the word “work” with what we don’t want to do, but Dan Cable explores the other approach: getting a buzz from it. It’s less about the job, and more about the way you use that job. Tune in to this deeply insightful conversation on how to connect and explore the work you’re already doing. Which tasks at work light you up? And how can you add more of them to your daily professional routine to add purpose and effect? Don’t forget to stick around for Ashley’s post-episode thoughts on Dan Cable, job-crafting and finding your light at work!
